title: enna kurai sol manamE
sahitya:
enna kurai sol manamE unakkini enna kurai shol manamE


anupallavi

  minnuDaluLLE uyir mannavanAga ulaga vAzhkkaiyil pinnE


caraNam    oppariya paramporuLil aruLilE onrupaTTAi enrum tonrutoTTE
karpanai kaDandadOr arputamAgiya kaLippil kavalaiyinri kuLippAi nalam shezhippAi
